name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CDC SARS2 Map Auto Color Scale Updater

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Runs a script on https://www.cdc.gov/nwss/rv/COVID19-currentlevels.html to update color scale

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When enabled, automatically runs script on https://www.cdc.gov/nwss/rv/COVID19-currentlevels.html that updates the color scale
